h1_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish
h2_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish Boss Fight and Guide
content: The Keeper of the Flaming Mountains will transport you to another place, in a monochrome illusion where he uses the power of yin-yang. Zhu Bajie will be there to help you at first, so focus on attacking the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains as quickly as you can. This is a two-phase fight, and as you might expect, the second phase is where the action really begins.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Keeper_of_the_Flaming_Mountains_and_Yin-Yang_Fish.md', within the main section titled 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish', specifically from the subsection 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The Keeper of the Flaming Mountains will transport you to another place, in a monochrome illusion where he uses the power of yin-yang. Zhu Bajie will be there to help you at first, so focus on attacking the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains as quickly as you can. This is a two-phase fight, and as you might expect, the second phase is where the action really begins.
